message.content:
To determine your sister's current age, we can use the following information:
- When you were 6, your sister was half your age (i.e., 3 years old).
- Now you are 80 years old.

To find out your sister's current age, add the difference in ages from when you were 6 to now:

80 years (your age) - 3 years (your sister's age when you were 6) = 77 years

So, your sister is currently 77 years old.
